name: Blue Hawaiian
description: The Blue Hawaiian strain is known for being quite a looker; its light green to orange buds are covered in rich orange and red hairs and are coated with sparkly trichomes throughout. Bred from Blueberry and Hawaiian Sativa, Blue Hawaiian is fruity and smooth. Flowers appear at Â about ten weeks and are described as giving a balanced high that has equal parts of its relaxing indica and uplifting sativa effects.
